channel.description: Recent content in Home on Test Site Header

item.title: Airway Stenting
item.description: Placement of stents to keep airways open.

item.title: Balloon Dilation
item.description: Use of balloons to dilate narrowed airways.

item.title: Bronchial Thermoplasty
item.description: Radiofrequency ablation of airway smooth muscle for severe asthma.

item.title: Bronchoscopic Lung Volume Reduction (BLVR)
item.description: Procedures to reduce lung volume in patients with emphysema.

item.title: Cryotherapy
item.description: Use of extreme cold to destroy abnormal tissues.

item.title: Electrocautery and Argon Plasma Coagulation (APC)
item.description: Use of electric current and argon gas to remove or destroy tissue.

item.title: Endobronchial Ultrasound (EBUS)
item.description: Use of ultrasound along with bronchoscopy to visualize structures in and around the airways.

item.title: Endoscopic Valve Placement
item.description: Placement of one-way valves to treat emphysema or persistent air leaks.

item.title: Flexible Bronchoscopy
item.description: Examination of the airways using a flexible bronchoscope.

item.title: Indwelling Pleural Catheter (IPC) Placement
item.description: Long-term catheter for drainage of pleural effusions.

item.title: Medical Thoracoscopy/Pleuroscopy
item.description: Minimally invasive examination and biopsy of the pleura.

item.title: Microdebrider Bronchoscopy
item.description: Mechanical removal of obstructive airway lesions.

item.title: Percutaneous Tracheostomy
item.description: Creation of an opening in the trachea through the neck to facilitate breathing.

item.title: Pleural Biopsy
item.description: Obtaining tissue samples from the pleura.

item.title: Pleurodesis
item.description: Fusion of the pleural layers to prevent recurrent pleural effusions.

item.title: Pulsed Electrical Field Therapy
item.description: Use of electrical fields to ablate abnormal tissues.

item.title: Radial EBUS
item.description: Use of radial probe ultrasound for peripheral lung lesions.

item.title: Robotic-Assisted Bronchoscopy
item.description: Use of robotic technology to enhance the precision and reach of bronchoscopic procedures.

item.title: The Second Thing
item.description: Duis neque nisi, dapibus sed mattis et quis, nibh. Sed et dapibus nisl amet mattis, sed a rutrum accumsan sed. Suspendisse eu. Suspendisse laoreet metus ut metus imperdiet interdum aliquam justo tincidunt.

item.title: Thoracentesis
item.description: Removal of pleural fluid for diagnostic or therapeutic purposes.

item.title: Transbronchial Needle Aspiration (TBNA)
item.description: Sampling of lymph nodes or masses adjacent to the airways.

item.title: The First Thing
item.description: Duis neque nisi, dapibus sed mattis et quis, nibh. Sed et dapibus nisl amet mattis, sed a rutrum accumsan sed. Suspendisse eu. Suspendisse laoreet metus ut metus imperdiet interdum aliquam justo tincidunt.
